item.title: [MRS/SGP][Network] - Backbone Incident Notification
item.description:
Jul 7, 13:32 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 07/07/2022 08:32 UTC
End Time : 07/07/2022 09:30 UTC
Comment : The instabilities are over. The teams rerouted the traffic as originally planned.

Jul 7, 08:56 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/07/2022 08:32 UTC
Service impact : The backbone links between Marseille and Singapore are currently experiencing instability.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently identifying the origin of the instabilities.
